means: 有效地，有法律效力地，全然

sentence.Network_en: In front of the line this showed up even more effectually.
sentence.Network_cn: 站在队伍的前头,这种姿势得到更加充分的表现.

sentence.Network_en: Mutiny was effectually laid to rest for the moment.
sentence.Network_cn: 叛乱总算暂时平定了下来.

sentence.Network_en: When the time came, he buoyed Carrie up most effectually.
sentence.Network_cn: 到了该上场时, 他已卓有成效地给嘉莉打足了气.

list.abs: ...人不是这样想的，此论文将这另一批人的想法，称之为「效果型思维」(Effectual Reasoning)，典型的发散型思维，他们不求哪里有 …
... ) effective operation 有效运行 ) effectual remedy 行之有效的疗法 ) feasible learning methods 行之有效的学习方法.
effectively 有效地事实上实际上effectiveness effectual 奏效的灵验的effectually
沪江词库精选effectual demand是什么意思、英语短语。effectual demand的中文翻译: 有效需求相关短语:  effectual drug 显效药  effectual demand 有效需求到沪江.

sentences.sentence: "Bismarck was constantly criticised by the more liberal newspapers, and he retaliated by passing an emergency decree that effectually muzzled the press"

auth_sentence.content: The Chicago Tribune was not alone in thinking that Seward had "effectually committed political suicide" by agreeing to stay on.
auth_sentence.res_content: The Chicago Tribune was not alone in thinking that Seward had "effectually committed political suicide" by agreeing to stay on.
